root: ^Hey detective, I'm pretty stuck on something.
^I've got this job to do in another town out past the city. The guy wants a real specific pattern for his garden but I can't quite figure it out.
^He's written it out with words rather than giving me a diagram... I've never really been one for puzzles.

c-0: ^You can? Thank you so much! Here's the instructions the client gave me.
c-1: ^Thanks! I'll give it my best shot.
^Where did I put that piece of paper again... Ah, whoops. Oh, don't mind me.
